rainfalls: As of today, there is no Heavy Rainfall Warning Issued.
thunderstorms:
Thunderstorm Advisory No. 39 #NCR_PRSD

Issued at: 9:01 PM, 01 July 2025(Tuesday)



Moderate to heavy rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are expected over Zambales, Bataan, Quezon and Rizal within the next 2 hours.



The above conditions are being experienced in Pampanga(Apalit, San Simon, Minalin, Santo Tomas, Candaba), Tarlac(Victoria, Tarlac City, Gerona, Pura, La Paz), Bulacan(San Miguel, San Ildefonso), Nueva Ecija(Gapan) and Metro Manila(Quezon City, Caloocan, Valenzuela) which may persist within 2 hours and may affect nearby areas.



All are advised to take precautionary measures against the impacts associated with these hazards which include flash floods and landslides.



Keep monitoring for updates.
